snippet: The move would appease Greek voters unhappy about austerity imposed by foreign creditors, while still giving the eurozone some control over the funds.
lead_paragraph: The move would appease Greek voters unhappy about austerity imposed by foreign creditors, while still giving the eurozone some control over the funds.

headline.main: Euro Officials Lend Support to Backup Credit Line for Greece
headline.print_headline: Euro Officials Lend Support to Backup Credit Line for Greece
